name: Speed Cargo
description: This game is about a fast cargo ship that is transporting goods in the vicinity. He takes them to the ports where the chimneys are smoking. He earns points for this, but if he doesn't get cargos on time, he doesn't get them. The steering is quite simple: you need the arrow keys or WASD for this. You can also change the quality settings (the default is low quality, so you can change for a better one).
